About us

CUSTOMIZED SOLUTIONS TO ANY CAPPING NEED

AROL was founded in 1978 in Canelli (Italy) and steadily grew as a global provider of capping solutions. We design 100% of our capping and caps sorting machines and we produce inside +95% of their parts.

700+ equipment delivered every year and 25.000+ installed all over the world in a vast variety of industries, from 1000 to 100.000 bph, make of AROL the largest specialist of customized solutions to any capping need.

The AROL technical support is available for the whole life cycle of the machine and counts on a highly skilled team of specialist operating from each of our 11 worldwide offices.

 

our mission

To be recognized as best-in-class experts in closing systems, providing added-value equipment and services focused in consumer’s safety.

our values

Meet the challenge
Fulfill the commitments
Build long term relationships

OUR STRATEGY

Innovative attitude
Top quality products and service
Implement best practices from multiple industries

Our plants

WE INTERNALLY PRODUCE +95% OF OUR MECHANICAL PARTS
Vertical integration of the whole manufacturing cycle guarantees a real production flexibility and a constant quality and delivery control through the entire process.
In Canelli (ASTI) AROL can count on 3 manufacturing plants:
MACHINES-TOOLS DEPARTMENT (+6500 sqm)
ASSEMBLING WORKSHOP AND WAREHOUSE (+20.000 sqm)
CAPS SORTERS AND COMPONENTS ASSEMBLING (5.500 sqm)

global presence

From Italy, where our Headquarters and production plants are, we are close to our customers wherever they are through our network of 11 branches.
USA
LATIN AMERICA
BRASIL
CHINA
INDIA
THAILAND
FRANCE
SPAIN
GERMANY
UK
KOREA

AROL work with us

Every day we work hard to meet the needs of our customers and to consolidate our position as a leader in the sector of closure systems. To achieve this, we rely on the passion and expertise of our people.

If you are ready to give your best, we will be happy to welcome you into a team that achieves its goals through competence and teamwork.

We are looking for ambitious people who accept AROL’s challenges.

Consult the currently open professional positions and apply.

If you do not identify any current open positions in line with your experiences and expectations, you can submit your "spontaneous application" to This email address is being protected from spambots. You need JavaScript enabled to view it. and have the opportunity to be contacted in the future.

Sales Manager – España y Portugal

Expired

 

DESCRIPCION

Responsable del desarrollo de todas las actividades comerciales del mercado y área asignado (España y Portugal) . Su papel es mantener y desarrollar posibilidades de negocio con los clientes existentes y también prospectar clientes potenciales con el objetivo de ganar negocio nuevo sector alimentación.

RESPONSABILIDADES

  • Atender las demandas del cliente y presentar el producto de una manera profesional y estructurada cara a cara con el objetivo de realizar una venta óptima.
  • Mantener y desarrollar relaciones con los clientes existentes de manera presencial, por medio de llamadas telefónicas y correos electrónicos y visitas.
  • Organizar reuniones con clientes potenciales para la apertura de nuevas posibilidades de negocio.
  • Responder a correos electrónicos y consultas telefónicas.
  • Actuar como enlace entre la empresa y sus mercados existentes y potenciales.
  • Recopilar información de los clientes y del mercado/sector.
  • Representar a la empresa en ferias, eventos y demostraciones.
  • Seguir todas las normativas de la compañía para atenerse a la política de trabajo y reportar correctamente a su supervisor o a la dirección comercial.
  • Asesorar en el desarrollo de productos y debatir las próximas promociones especiales.
  • Registrar las ventas y la información de pedidos en el sistema informático utilizado por la empresa.
  • Revisar el rendimiento de las propias ventas para alcanzar o superar los objetivos.
  • Asistir a las reuniones del equipo y compartir experiencias con equipo de ventas.

RELACIONES Y FUNCIONES

  • Informar periódicamente al Supervisor de zona o responsable comercial sobre el seguimiento de la actividad y de las medidas que deben adoptarse para mejorar los resultados.
  • Cumplir o supera las obligaciones de su actividad en materia de llamadas, citas, presentaciones y propuestas.
  • Asume la autoridad y la responsabilidad de rendir cuentas en el seguimiento de todas las operaciones.
  • Reportar correctamente a la dirección acerca de las ventas, visitas, formas de organización y hábitos de trabajo.
  • Mantener el contacto con todos los clientes de su zona para asegurar altos niveles de satisfacción del cliente.
  • Demostrar capacidad de interactuar y cooperar con todos los empleados de la empresa.

REQUISITOS MINIMOS

  • Preferentemente se requiere un título universitario en Ciencias Empresariales o Ingeniería Técnica, o un mínimo de tres años de experiencia en ventas sector maquinaria para alimentación, en la que parte técnica sea determinante.
  • Son necesarias excelentes habilidades de comunicación oral y escrita.
  • Optimo concomimiento de la lengua española, otras lenguas (Inglés, Italiano, Portugués, Frances) serán particularmente apreciadas.
  • Capacidad de comunicar cuestiones técnicas complejas, con buenas habilidades de presentación.
  • Excelente capacidad de organización, comunicación y habilidades para resolver problemas.
  • Capacidad de automotivación y con habilidades para poder trabajar con mínima supervisión.
  • Habilidades de negociación consolidadas y buenas habilidades sociales.
  • Fuerte conocimiento de la dinámica del mercado, de los clientes y sus necesidades.
  • Disponibilidad para viajar frecuentemente y trabajar en un equipo global de profesionales.
  • Carnet de conducir.

 

EXPERIENCIA MINIMA

Al menos 3 años

 

AROL S.p.A.  Barcelona, Cataluña, España (Sede)

Arol Group

The AROL GROUP companies serve the beverage, food, wine, spirits, personal care, chemical, household care and cosmetics industries. its mission is to provide outstanding machineries that preserve customers' products and increase packaging line efficiency.

In addition to AROL, the group consists of:

 

maca engineering

MACA ENGINEERING, specialist in designing and manufacturing machines for the production, assembly and cut of aluminium and plastic caps and closures.

www.macaengineering.com

TIRELLI

TIRELLI, which develops and produce filling, capping and labelling systems mainly for the cosmetics and home and body care industry.

www.tirelli.net

unimac-gherri

UNIMAC-GHERRI, the specialist in filling and capping of glass, metal and plastic containers with twist-off and pre-threaded caps for dense, semi dense and pasty products.

www.unimac-gherri.com

INNOVATIVE ATTITUDE

AROL GROUP can count on a dynamic r&d team who serves as our companies innovation engine.

The team leverages on 40+ years’ experience and the latest available technologies to create innovative and original application for any customer’s need, designing at the same time future scenarios.

Customer care

 

For us, “customer care” means standing shoulder to shoulder with you with an extensive network of technical experts worldwide, a comprehensive portfolio of products and services, in any situation, even when your AROL machines are operating at top capacity.

 

 

audit

Inspection and survey of status of machines/lines, data collection and information necessary to define/schedule the works and/or new supplies

FORMAT CHANGE

Installation of machine or components, assistance during first production start-up

MACHINE DOWN

Evaluation of problems and/or restoration of machine conditions (or its components) following a failure

CUSTOMER TRAINING

Training and updating in regards to the operation, maintenance and use of the machine

PREVENTIVE, PREDICTIVE, FAILURE MAINTENANCE

Scheduled/occasional maintenance for the purposes of maintenance/functional and efficient repair of machines/lines

INSTALLATION AND START-UP

Installation and start-up of machine or lines for production

TECHNICAL SUPPORT/PRODUCTION ASSISTANCE

Resolution of problems and improvement of machine performance. Includes supervision of the machine during production.

REMOTE ASSISTANCE

Video call remote assistance

service

spare parts

CENTRALIZED SPARE PARTS OFFER MANAGEMENT (1-3 DAYS AVERAGE RESPONSE TIME)

    • Availability of customized spares

    • Red lane delivery on request

    • Over 15000 spares items ready

    • List of recommended spares for overhauling (after 3000/6000/12000/18000 hours) and first emergency kit/QMP

IMPROVE YOUR EXISTING CAPPER’S CAPABILITIES WITH NEW COMPONENTS

    • Analysis and quotation for caps application and movement

    • Reconditioning items

    • Optional equipment

    • Best solutions for new caps 

upgrades

TRAINING

LIVE OR ON-LINE TRAINING

Keeping pace with technological innovation means to constantly update our knowledge. This is why we at AROL have always invested in staff training.

For the same reason, we put our know-how at the disposal of our customers, offering training services aimed at training operators and technicians on the machines they use. We can train personnel at their own premises, at AROL or in-line.

With this innovative service, AROL intends to prove its willingness to assist customers step by step even after the machine has been sold, offering assistance for personnel and for machines.

The training service is held by experts and is specifically prepared on the customer’s needs, taking certain aspects into consideration, e.g. past experience of personnel to be trained, type of use and level of customisation of the machine on which personnel will subsequently work.

Wine & Spirits

Automatic capping machines for wine and spirits

White wine, red wine, sparkling wine, semi-sparkling wine, spirits…: AROL provides capping machines for the widest range of container sizes, shapes and types as well as various type of caps, ensuring quality and integrity of the final product.

Press-on caps

Expired

AROL offers single or multi-heads plug cappers for your press-on cap, no matter which is the markets.

Machines

Mushroom corks

Expired

Pressure wines such as champagnes, ciders, sparkling wines in general, and some beers, require a seal which prevents the escape of gases while at the same time preserving the correct gas pressure within the bottles. For this cork, AROL offers several solutions according with your production speed.

Machines

Straight corks

Expired

Natural, agglomerated or synthetic straight corks: arol manufactures the widest range of cappers for wine or spirit, up to 40.000 bph.

Machines

Mushroom plastic corks

Expired

Mushroom plastic corks are used extensively in wine market. Plastic corks are available in several styles and designs. Discover the perfect arol plugger machine ideal for your closure.

Machines

Bidule + Crown caps

Expired

The traditional method (also called champenoise method) is one of the most famous process used in the wine market to produce sparkling wine. AROL provides a solution for applying the bidule and the crown cap with a monoblock, compact machine with high efficiency. For small speed production, you can even think at a single-head machine, able to achieve 2500 bph.

Machines

Expired

Ropp aluminum caps can be applied on a large variety of containers across multiple markets. For example, glass bottles filled with mineral and natural waters, soft drinks, juices, edible oil, pet bottles, aluminum bottles filled with soft drinks, beer, and wine.

Expired

Beer

Automatic capping machines for beer

Whether you are a small brewery or a multinational company, whether you use glass, aluminum or PET bottles, you will find in AROL product range the perfect capper to accommodate any beer production need.

Steel crown cork

Expired

Steel crown corks represent the ideal solution for glass, plastic and aluminium bottles of any type of soft drinks, water, beer or wine: for this cork AROL proposes a crowner suitable for the application of both 26 Ø and 29 Ø up to 60.000 bph.

Machines

Ring pull

Expired

For this kind of cork, used on glass, aluminium and plastic bottles of beer, soft and energy drinks, AROL has designed a specific model of multi-head or single-head.

Machines

Mushroom corks

Expired

Pressure beverages such as champagnes, ciders, sparkling wines, and some beers require a seal which prevents the escape of gases while at the same time preserving the correct gas pressure within the bottles. For this cork, AROL offers several solutions according with your production speed.

Beverage

Automatic capping machines for beverage

Carbonated and non-carbonated soft drinks, energy drinks, sports drinks, coffee and tea-based products, nutritional drinks…any type of product, any size producer, AROL offers the appropriate cappping machines for your container and closure ensuring quality and integrity of the final product.
Our cappers run PET, HDPE, glass or aluminium bottles with high efficiency.
Our product line includes decappers, to remove plastic and aluminium caps from glass and PET bottles for recycling.

Press-on overcaps

Expired

AROL offers single or multi-heads plug cappers for your press-on overcap on pet or glass bottles.

Machines

Pre-threaded flat plastic caps

Expired

AROL's equipment is able to run typical beverage plastic caps from 1.500 bph up to 90.000 bph.

Machines

Pre-threaded irregular geometry caps

Expired

Thanks to the flexibility of our machines, we handle any kind of cap with irregular geometry, unusual shapes, or oversize dimensions.

Machines

Pre-threaded sport plastic caps

Expired

For this kind of cap used in several markets such as energy, health drinks, water, or juice, AROL offers multi-head and single-head cappers that applies caps of various sizes and thickness.

Machines

Press-on cover for cans

Expired

AROL provides single or multi-head cappers for press-on overcap or lid on cans of various sizes.

Machines

Ring pull

Expired

This kind of closure is typically used on glass, aluminium, and plastic bottles which contain beer and/or energy drinks. AROL provides a dedicated machine that runs both the ring pull and crown closures.

Machines

Ropp aluminum caps

Expired

ROPP aluminum caps can be applied on a large variety of containers across multiple markets. For example, glass bottles filled with mineral and natural waters, soft drinks, juices, edible oil, PET bottles, aluminum bottles filled with soft drinks, beer, and wine.

No matter what type of container, AROL has the widest range of multi-head or single-head cappers for ROPP aluminium caps.
AROL also provides a solution for removing the ROPP cap from glass bottle and ref-PET bottle.

Machines

Steel crown cork

Expired

Crowns are still widely used with glass, plastic, and aluminium bottles. AROL’s traditional Crowner run both 26 and 29 crowns.

Machines

Aluminum crown cork

Expired

AROL provides a crowner suitable for running the 26 and 29 aluminium crown cork up to 14.400 bph.

Machines

Pre-threaded plastic caps for pouches

Expired

For all those manufacturers who have chosen pouch packaging for their products, AROL offers different capping solutions according with their speed production and cap type and shape.

Machines

Twist off (lug cap)

Expired

AROL’s rotary lug capper is the maximum of flexibility: it can apply lug but, if needed, also plastic screw caps.

Machines

Tethered caps

Expired

For tethered caps, designed so that they remain connected to the bottle even after opening, AROL’s offers different solution, whether they are snap-on or tethered screw caps.

Machines
